typedef struct SteeringSensor SteeringSensor;

/* const part of ActorClass (ROM) */
typedef struct SteeringSensor_const {

	/* simple ports */

	const SendDataConjPort Steerdata;

	/* data receive ports */

	/* saps */
	const PTimerConjPort timer;

	/* replicated ports */

	/* services */
} SteeringSensor_const;


/* constant for state machine data */
#define STEERINGSENSOR_HISTORY_SIZE 2

/* variable part of ActorClass (RAM) */
struct SteeringSensor {
	const SteeringSensor_const* const constData;

	/* data send ports */

	/*--------------------- attributes ---------------------*/
	 float32 steer;
	 char str[40]
	;
	 char temp_string[40]
	;
	 float32 steering;
	 char send_string[40]
	;


	/* state machine variables */
	etInt16 state;

};
